title: Design YAML schema and create collections.ts module
description: Create collections.ts to manage YAML-based collection configuration at ~/.config/qmd/index.yml. Define TypeScript types for collections and contexts. Implement load/save functions with Bun's native YAML support.
design:
YAML structure:
```yaml
# Global context for all collections
global_context: "..."

collections:
  name:
    path: /absolute/path
    pattern: "**/*.md"
    context:
      "/path/prefix": "Description"
      "/": "Root context"
```

TypeScript types:
- Collection: { path, pattern, context }
- CollectionConfig: { global_context?, collections }
- Functions: loadConfig(), saveConfig(), getCollection(), listCollections()
